subject: RS
title: Aging and the Spiritual Life
description: Engaging experience, theory, and reflection, this course explores spirituality as a central aspect of growth and development in later life. This course draws on perspectives from various faith and humanistic traditions. Topics include religious beliefs and spiritual concerns later in life, a spirituality of aging, providing spiritual care to persons in later life, spirituality and dementia, and death and dying. [Note: This course fulfils an Area 3 requirement for Religious Studies majors.]
